sys_pd_activity.description: Select a Manager to escalate incident
sys_pd_activity.label: Escalate Incident

sys_variable_value.value: Select a Manager to escalate this incident

sys_pd_activity.description: Verify if the ticket has been assigned to Alpha Tier1 Ops and the issue reported is a bandwidth upgrade issue.
sys_pd_activity.label: Verify Incident Details
sys_pd_activity.name: instruction_1

sys_pd_activity.description: Show a list of existing incidents for the caller
sys_pd_activity.label: Review existing incidents for caller
sys_pd_activity.name: show_list_of_records

sys_pd_activity.description: Send an email to the caller of the incident
sys_pd_activity.label: Email Caller
sys_pd_activity.name: email_caller

sys_variable_value.value: Prompts for confirmation of email subject and body before sending.

sys_pd_activity.description: Issue acknowledgement email to the caller
sys_pd_activity.label: Email - Issue Acknowledgement
sys_pd_activity.name: send_email

sys_variable_value.value: Prompts for confirmation of email subject and body before sending.
Thank you for your patience. We have verified that the issue has been resolved. Please revert back to us in case of any concerns.

sys_pd_activity.description: Set category and sub-category for proper routing and tracking
sys_pd_activity.label: Categorize the Incident
sys_pd_activity.name: user_form

sys_pd_activity.description: Review this incident's related Task SLAs
sys_pd_activity.label: Review SLAs
sys_pd_activity.name: show_list_of_records

sys_pd_activity.description: If bandwidth < 150 Mbps - No approval required If bandwidth > 150 Mbps - Manager approval required Proceed with the next steps
sys_pd_activity.label: Approval Required?
sys_pd_activity.name: instruction_1

sys_pd_activity.description: Send an email to the manager requesting approval for the bandwidth upgrade
sys_pd_activity.label: Request Manager Approval
sys_pd_activity.name: send_email

sys_variable_value.value: Prompts for confirmation of email subject and body before sending.
This customer needs your approval for bandwidth upgrade. Please review the request and provide it at your earliest convinience.

sys_pd_activity.description: Check if the "Approval" field of the incident has the value "Approved". Only proceed with the next steps if the value is approved.
sys_pd_activity.label: Verify Manager Approval
sys_pd_activity.name: instruction

sys_pd_activity.label: Steps to perform a bandwidth upgrade
sys_pd_activity.name: show_knowledge_article

sys_variable_value.value: Steps to perform a bandwidth upgrade
Perform a bandwidth upgrade on a router

sys_pd_activity.description: Email the caller after the issue resolution
sys_pd_activity.label: Email - Issue Resolution
sys_pd_activity.name: send_email

sys_variable_value.value: Prompts for confirmation of email subject and body before sending.
Thank you for your patience. We have verified that the issue has been resolved. Please revert back to us in case of any concerns.

sys_pd_activity.label: Child task for performing bandwidth upgrade
sys_pd_activity.name: create_child_task

sys_variable_value.value: Perform the bandwidth upgrade and close the task appropriately
